Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Hepatitis B Virus Core Protein (155-175), HBc155-175

UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Identification of a novel antimicrobial peptide from human hepatitis B virus core protein arginine-rich domain (ARD).
Literature.Author: Chen HL, et al.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MBC=5.4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=43.23µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13884(MBC=>86.46µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=>86.46µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 19636(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(no activity data),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(no activity data)
